ca721325-d8d4-4de7-b1cc-fab5ed280960.description: Earners of this badge are trained in the basic capabilities and advanced features of Talend Studio. They understand how to use it to build reliable, maintainable data integration tasks using a highly scalable tool set to access, transform, and integrate data from any business system to meet operational and analytical data integration needs.
ca721325-d8d4-4de7-b1cc-fab5ed280960.name: Talend Studio Explorer

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Introduction to Talend Studio learning plan.
Complete end of module assessments for Talend Studio in context, Getting started with Talend Studio, and Designing a data integration project.
Expected completion 3 hours

59f61f78-9d30-479a-9a5c-f142e0592ca8.description: Earners of this badge are able to address data integration, data governance, and application integration. They understand how Talend Data Fabric can help extract value from your data to deliver trusted data within their organization.
59f61f78-9d30-479a-9a5c-f142e0592ca8.name: Talend Data Fabric Explorer

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Fabric Foundations learning plan.

Complete the modules and the assessment for Talend Cloud Foundations, Talend Cloud Data Preparation Foundations, Pipeline Designer Foundations, Talend Cloud Data Inventory Foundations, Talend Cloud Data Stewardship Foundations, and Talend Data Catalog Foundations, and Talend Studio Foundations.
Complete the modules and the assessment for Talend Studio Foundations, Talend Cloud API Services Fundations, Talend ESB Foundation, and Stitch (Data Loader) Foundations.

Complete the modules and the assessment for Talend Data Integration Foundations, Talend Data Mapper Foundations, Talend Big Data Foundations, Talend Management Console Foundations, and Talend Administration Center Foundations.
Duration: ½  day (4 hours)

c0a219c2-f57a-46a3-b2c9-3419777da9c8.description: The Ready, Set, Go! badge is the first achievement in the Talend Academy Lifelong Learner badge track. Earning this badge recognizes that you have completed an orientation designed to make you familiar with how to use the Talend Academy platform. You are now ready to continue your learning journey…GO!
c0a219c2-f57a-46a3-b2c9-3419777da9c8.name: Talend Ready, Set, Go!

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners have successfully completed the Getting Started with Talend Academy course.

d42fd2e9-5086-40bb-a159-2b84709d9108.description: Earners of this badge are trained in the basic capabilities and advanced features of Talend Studio. They understand how to use it to build reliable, maintainable data integration tasks using a highly scalable tool set to access, transform, and integrate data from any business system to meet operational and analytical data integration needs.
d42fd2e9-5086-40bb-a159-2b84709d9108.name: Talend Data Integration Developer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Talend Data Integration Basics learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Getting started with Talend Data Integration, Working with files, Working with databases, Using repository metadata, Processing data, Using contexts and context variables, Building executables and Docker images from data integration Jobs, Controlling execution, Handling errors, Working with web services, and Use case: Creating a master sales table from different data sources.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Successfully complete the Talend Data Integration Advanced learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Using Git in Talend Studio, Remote Job execution, Basic debugging, Parallel execution, Memorizing data, Joblets, Using Java Code and routines, and Change Data Capture.
Duration: 1 day (7 hours)

bb3e9140-2639-45d1-a2fb-106b16791422.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Data Integration v7 Certified Developer exam. Earners of this badge can effectively demonstrate their knowledge and experience to implement Talend Data Integration projects.
bb3e9140-2639-45d1-a2fb-106b16791422.name: Talend Data Integration Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Recommend completion of the Talend Data Integration Basics learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Data Integration Advanced learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
At least 6 months of experience using Talend products.
General knowledge of data integration architecture and advanced features such as parallelization.

Experience with Talend Data Integration 7.x solutions, including manual installation and configuration, project management, user management, Job deployment strategies, and troubleshooting of common issues.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Integration v7 Certified Developer exam.
Expected completion time: 70 minutes

86ae9023-4608-47c4-86db-920efc1bcde1.description: Earners of this badge demonstrate an effective understanding of Talend Management Console to perform administrative and security implementations, optimize storage utilization, integrate cloud and on-premises applications, manage execution engines, and deploy integration projects across separate environments.
86ae9023-4608-47c4-86db-920efc1bcde1.name: Talend Cloud Administrator Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Essentials learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Talend Cloud in context, Introduction to Pipeline Designer, Creating and executing a data preparation, Running tasks in the cloud, Handling tasks in Talend Data Stewardship, and Implementing cloud operations
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Administration learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Talend Cloud Administration in context, Creating users and roles in Talend Cloud, Running tasks on a cloud engine, Defining remote projects in Talend Management Console, Working with remote engines, Deploying artifacts to Talend Cloud, Using Talend Management Console API, Logging and monitoring in Talend Management Console, and Monitoring activities on Talend Cloud applications using the Audit logging API service.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)

05432f45-faa9-46dc-9304-cbd4bdc5737c.description: Earners of this badge demonstrate an effective understanding of the advanced features of Talend Studio to perform administrative tasks, maintenance, and security implementations. In addition, they can manage execution engines, customize data, and integrate on-premises and cloud applications to implement solutions with Talend Data Fabric.
05432f45-faa9-46dc-9304-cbd4bdc5737c.name: Talend Data Integration Administrator Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completion of the Talend Data Integration Administration learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Introduction to Talend Data Integration server, Talend Administration Center, Talend Studio, Deploying Jobs, Monitoring the Talend server, and Using Git in Talend projects.
Duration: ½ day course (3 hours)

f7930397-ea18-4f54-ab20-1313fd9db4ee.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Cloud Certified Administrator exam. These badge earners have demonstrated their knowledge of how to build and manage Talend on-premises projects, and migrate them to a cloud environment.
f7930397-ea18-4f54-ab20-1313fd9db4ee.name: Talend Cloud Certified Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Recommend completion of the Talend Cloud Essentials learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Cloud Administration learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
At least 6 months of product experience is recommended.
Experience with Talend Cloud administration, architecture, and applications.
Thorough knowledge of Talend Management Console.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Cloud Certified Administrator Exam
Expected completion time: 55 minutes

cf2aadee-30e0-4f02-a6c8-913f47ddc54e.description: Earners of this badge are trained in the basic capabilities and advanced features of Big Data. They can tackle data processing challenges for huge data sets, utilizing Big Data frameworks and the Hadoop ecosystem, including Spark, HDFS, Hive, and Kafka.
cf2aadee-30e0-4f02-a6c8-913f47ddc54e.name: Talend Big Data Developer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Big Data Basics learning plan.
Complete end of module assessments for Big Data in context, Connecting to the Hadoop cluster, Reading and writing data in HDFS, and Processing Hive data in standard Jobs
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Big Data Advanced - Spark Batch learning plan.
Complete end of module assessments for Spark in context, Introduction to Spark, Sentiment analysis use case, and Download analysis use case.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Big Data Advanced - Spark Streaming learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for Reading and writing messages with Kafka, Logs processing use case - monitoring, Logs processing use case - reporting, and Logs processing use case - log analysis.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)

bc6993e6-c70f-479e-a6b5-7a2a62a2b41d.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Big Data Certified Developer exam. Earners of this badge have demonstrated extensive product knowledge that is required to implement and manage Talend Big Data projects.
bc6993e6-c70f-479e-a6b5-7a2a62a2b41d.name: Talend Big Data Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Recommend completion of the Talend Big Data Basics learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Big Data Advanced - Spark Batch learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Big Data Advanced - Spark Streaming learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
At least 6 months experience using the Talend products.
General knowledge of Hadoop (HDFS, Hive, HBase, Sqoop, YARN), Spark, Kafka, the Talend Big Data architecture, and Kerberos.
Experience with Talend Big Data 8.x solutions and Talend Studio, including metadata creation, configuration, and troubleshooting.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Big Data Certified Developer exam.
Expected completion time: 65 minutes

4455a543-4aff-487f-b8ca-662c96c718ae.description: Earners of this badge are trained to collect and manage metadata from data stores, data models, data integration and business intelligence tools, and business applications using Talend Data Catalog bridges. They can use a business glossary to collaboratively build and manage the organization's business concepts and terminology.
4455a543-4aff-487f-b8ca-662c96c718ae.name: Talend Data Catalog Implementer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Catalog Basics learning plan.
Complete the end of module assessments for Introduction to Talend Data Catalog, Harvesting metadata, Stitching metadata, and Business glossary and semantic mapping.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Catalog Advanced learning plan.
Complete the end of module assessments for Talend Data Catalog in context, Automating harvesting and versioning, Implementing security settings, Working collaboratively, and Going further.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)

319be303-fecb-4fd3-b799-cadea66d6b49.description: A Cloud Administrator Professional can assess the real-life challenges of their organization to make complex ongoing decisions when migrating older versions of on-premises projects to Talend Cloud. Earners of this badge have demonstrated the ability to analyze on-premises architecture and projects to create a Talend Cloud environment that mirrors on-premises projects used to migrate, publish, and test Jobs before promoting them to a production environment.
319be303-fecb-4fd3-b799-cadea66d6b49.name: Talend Cloud Administrator Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Basics learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Advanced learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Administration learning plan.
Duration:  ½ day course
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Essentials learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Administration learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Hands-On Migration use case.
At least 12 months of product experience is recommended.
Experience with Talend Studio and Talend Administration Center.
Experience with Talend Cloud administration, architecture, and applications.
Experience with migration from on-premises to Talend Cloud.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Cloud Certified Administrator exam.
Expected completion time: 55 minutes
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Cloud Administrator Professional exam.
Expected completion time: 2 days

9d12ac50-0f0a-433c-8073-e5b6b7107421.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend API Services Certified Developer exam. These badge earners have demonstrated their knowledge of how to design and implement services, route messages, and enable teams to quickly build and deploy real-time data services.
9d12ac50-0f0a-433c-8073-e5b6b7107421.name: Talend API Services Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Recommend completion of the Application Integration Essentials and Application Integration Advanced learning plans.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Data Mapper Essentials learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Recommend completion of the Talend Cloud API Services learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Recommend completion of the Handling REST requests and complex mappings in Talend Cloud use case.
At least 6 months of product experience is recommended.
Knowledge and experience with Talend API Services (Routes, SOAP Web services, and REST Web services).
Knowledge of Talend API Management (API Designer and API Tester) and Talend Data Mapper.
Thorough knowledge of Talend Management Console.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend API Services Certified Developer exam.
Expected completion time: 90 minutes

042b4570-5651-4d7d-9e61-36a79e8d3b8b.description: Congratulations! You’ve won the “Rising Star” award at the first ever Global Delivery Talend’s Got Talent event.

badge_template_activities.title: Participant

c6bc158f-3e73-42d0-9d88-cfecfd682419.description: Talend Partners who hold this credential have an active partner agreement with Talend and have met and maintained the required level of trained personnel. The Talend Cloud Trained Partner Badge recognizes an organization's commitment to delivering successful implementations by investing in the rigorous training programs essential for successful delivery of Talend Cloud implementations.
c6bc158f-3e73-42d0-9d88-cfecfd682419.name: Talend Cloud Trained Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of partner training plans in Talend Cloud
Successful completion of partner training plans in Talend Data Integration
Commercial experience in the development and deployment of Talend implementations

9f202d4f-aebb-4b37-a076-889f707b895c.description: Earners of the Data Catalog Implementer Professional badge can successfully contribute to data governance goals and initiatives through the implementation of the data catalog in support of data governance principles and practices, while modernizing data infrastructures to build trustworthy data-driven quality.
9f202d4f-aebb-4b37-a076-889f707b895c.name: Talend Data Catalog Implementer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Catalog Basics learning plan
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Catalog Advanced learning plan
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
At least 12 months of product experience is recommended.
Experience with Tableau and data analytics.
Knowledge of cloud migration.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Catalog Certified Implementer exam.
Expected completion time: 60 minutes
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Catalog Implementer Professional exam.

345db963-55c3-449a-8824-b933e72b38ae.description: Earners of this badge have knowledge of data health concepts and behaviors that support healthy, scalable, high-quality data, and can leverage data quality service (DQS) technologies to monitor and assess the quality of their data.
345db963-55c3-449a-8824-b933e72b38ae.name: Talend Data Health Explorer

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Health Foundations learning plan.
Complete the end of module assessments for Data Health Overview.
Duration: 30 minutes

a623ad60-c38e-4bc5-809e-09eea796524f.description: Earners of this badge are trained to address any integration challenge using Talend Data Services and the API Management solution. They understand how to integrate data and applications into a microservices architecture, including service definition and implementation, message mediation, testing, and deployment of real-time data services.
a623ad60-c38e-4bc5-809e-09eea796524f.name: Talend API Services Developer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Talend Data Mapper Essentials learning plan.
Complete end of module assessments for: Creating structures and maps, Using loops, Using functions, Integrating maps with data integration, Integrating maps in Routes, and Creating test cases.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successfully complete the Talend ESB Basics learning plan.

Complete end of module assessments for: Creating mediation Routes, Exploring message exchanges and the SiMPLE language, Message processing with JavaBeans, Rerouting messages, Discovering EIPs, Calling DI Jobs from Routes, Exploring more EIPs, Messaging with a dedicated broker, Debugging Routes, Developing REST Web services, and Developing SOAP Web services (optional).
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Successfully complete the Talend Cloud API Services learning plan.
Complete end of module assessments for: Using API Designer, Developing REST services for APIs, Using API Tester, Deploying API services, and Using API Portal.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)

a4642f62-34e2-4f6d-a30a-ac1ce6feb78a.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Data Value Certified Implementer exam. Earners of this badge are able to use cloud-based and on-premises services to identify and resolve data challenges, systemically improve data reliability, and reduce data risk to improve and manage the quality of data for business usability.
a4642f62-34e2-4f6d-a30a-ac1ce6feb78a.name: Talend Data Value Certified Implementer

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Trust Score learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Data Preparation learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (6 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Data Stewardship learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Quality Essentials learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
At least 6 months of experience using Talend product.
Experience with data preparation, data stewardship, and data analysis in Talend Cloud.
Thorough knowledge of data processing and management using Data Quality Service and tools.
Familiarity with Talend Studio for Data Quality.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Value Certified Implementer exam.
Expected completion time: 90 minutes

21230d07-b042-4222-9374-ed24e2ff310e.description: Earners of this badge are trained to use cloud-based and on-premises services to prepare data for analysis; ensure data is accessible, usable, safe, and trustworthy; and use cloud analytic algorithms to identify patterns and trends in client data to extract and deliver results.
21230d07-b042-4222-9374-ed24e2ff310e.name: Talend Data Value Implementer Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Quality Essentials learning plan.
Complete the end of module assessments for Data Quality analyses, Advanced matching, Data cleansing, and Data privacy.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Data Preparation learning plan.

Complete the end of module assessments for Preparing data using Data Inventory and Data Preparation, Working with large data volumes in Talend Cloud, Using Data Integration for Data Preparation Cloud, Using the Magic Fill in Data Preparation Cloud, Talend Data Preparation advanced functions, and Working with semantic types.
Duration: 1 day course (6 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Data Stewardship learning plan.
Complete the end of module assessments for Resolution campaigns, Grouping campaigns, Arbitration campaigns, Merging campaigns, Monitoring campaigns, and Creating data quality rules.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Cloud Trust Score learning plan.

Complete the end of module assessments for Preparing data using Data Inventory and Data Preparation, Introduction to Pipeline designer, Preparing data using Pipeline designer, Resolution campaigns for data analysts, and Improving the dimensions of the Trust Score.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)

8d1e25de-34b5-467a-bf92-1d62f1010c99.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Solution Architect exam. Earners of this badge have the skills to understand the fundamentals of the applications and capabilities of Talend Data Fabric, know how successfully apply Talend capabilities in customer solutions, be able to adopt best practices for performance, redundancy, security and privacy and articulate the value of Talend solutions and service.
8d1e25de-34b5-467a-bf92-1d62f1010c99.name: Talend Certified Solution Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Certified Developer Solution Architect learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (15 hours)
Read and review relevant Talend Data Fabric user guides.
At least three or more years of experience in data integration, application integration, and data management.
Experience in applying customer solutions using Talend Data Fabric, reference architectures, and best practices for sizing, performance, security, and privacy.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Certified Solution Architect exam.
Expected completion time: 90 minutes

95b547cf-4c43-486f-b849-102870995787.description: The Talend Cloud Expert Partner Badge recognizes partners with a consistent track record of successful Talend Cloud architecture and implementations. Talend Partners who hold this credential have an active partner agreement with Talend, have a minimum number of personnel achieving the highest levels of Talend Certification, have a track record of customer success and customer satisfaction.
95b547cf-4c43-486f-b849-102870995787.name: Talend Cloud Expert Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Personnel trained and attaining the highest levels of technical certification in Talend Cloud

Personnel completing specialized training topics and advanced project simulations
Consistent record of successful Talend Cloud implementations
Thought leadership and advanced solution architecture capabilities

8c5b7af1-5132-4df0-89bd-425c73fadb30.description: Talend Partners who hold this credential have an active partner agreement with Talend and have met and maintained the required level of trained personnel. 7ba2b6b4-edfb-4a28-b90b-f21d2656c361.name: Talend Data Governance Expert Partner

8921b1bf-c60b-4d47-8e30-017124e76e21.description: This badge recognizes the significant contribution a subject matter expert (SME) makes to the Talend Certification Program. 9eaa2d78-b7a7-417e-bdc2-74270f520e70.description: An API Services Developer Professional can enable an organization to implement, deploy, and validate API services using REST API, Talend API Management, and Talend Management Console. e6597f2f-e033-4f12-a499-43d3fafc4cc1.description: This certification badge is awarded to candidates who pass the Talend Core Certified Developer exam. Earners of this badge are able to use the skills necessary to develop and deploy high availability Talend Jobs, services, and solutions, including configuring and implementing data fabric security measures.
e6597f2f-e033-4f12-a499-43d3fafc4cc1.name: Talend Core Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Core Certified Developer learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (15 hours)
Completion of learning plan and some experience using Talend products is recommended.
General knowledge of Talend Data Integration architecture model and solutions.

Experience with data integration solutions, Talend API Services REST services and meditation routes, pipeline designing, Data Inventory connections and trust scores, data preparation, managing and running tasks and plans in Talend Cloud Management, and establishing Data Fabric security measures.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Core Certified Developer exam.
Expected completion time: 90 minutes

ae7bba60-761a-4c59-8216-368168956b7c.description: The Talend Data Governance Skilled Partner Badge recognizes the partner's Talend Data Governance implementation capabilities. Talend Partners who hold this credential have an active partner agreement with Talend, have met and maintained certified personnel and have a track record of successful Data Governance Implementations.
ae7bba60-761a-4c59-8216-368168956b7c.name: Talend Data Governance Skilled Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Personnel trained and attaining technical certification in Talend Data Catalog
Successful delivery of multiple Talend Data Governance implementations

acb69e52-500f-4c03-9c7a-e67a006262cd.description: Earners of the Data Integration Developer Professional badge can successfully demonstrate the ability to implement projects based on real-life challenges using technical skills and experience, and their knowledge of Talend best practices.
acb69e52-500f-4c03-9c7a-e67a006262cd.name: Talend Data Integration Developer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Basics learning plan.
Duration: 2 day course (14 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Advanced learning plan.
Duration: 1 day course (7 hours)
Successful completion of the Talend Data Integration Administration learning plan.
Duration: ½ day course
At least 12 months of product experience is recommended.
Thorough knowledge of Talend Studio.
Experience with Talend Data Integration 7.x solutions.
Experience with the Datamart data model.
Experience with Talend Solution Templates.
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Integration v7 Certified Developer exam.
Expected completion time: 70 minutes
Achieve a passing score on the Talend Data Integration Developer Professional exam.
Expected completion time: 2 days

3fd09017-97b3-4ded-872f-d795274b33b3.description: Congratulations! You’ve won the “Most Unique” award at the first ever Global Delivery Talend’s Got Talent event.
3fd09017-97b3-4ded-872f-d795274b33b3.name: Talend’s Got Talent – Most Unique

badge_template_activities.title: Most Unique

5feb454e-4bce-44e0-b40a-d5df18a982df.description: The Community Evangelist badge is awarded to candidates who provide a significant contribution to Talend Community. Earners of this badge are able use their knowledge to help thousands of community users get the most out of Talend's products by answering questions in the Talend Community.
5feb454e-4bce-44e0-b40a-d5df18a982df.name: Talend Support Community Evangelist

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.

6fd7bad9-7bf1-4270-ab2a-dc7a743cd0b6.description: The Customer Superhero badge is awarded to candidates who go above and beyond to solve a customer’s problem. Earners of this badge use their strong product knowledge in collaboration with internal teams to develop and deploy simple, accurate solutions allowing customers to gain maximum value.
6fd7bad9-7bf1-4270-ab2a-dc7a743cd0b6.name: Talend Support Customer Superhero

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.

938c11d3-80a7-4ae0-af86-12d2c9f85d6b.description: The Ideas Architect badge is awarded to those who design and create high quality solutions to improve customer engagements. Earners of this badge use their deep architecture expertise to build solutions that create a significant self-service opportunity for our customers.
938c11d3-80a7-4ae0-af86-12d2c9f85d6b.name: Talend Support Ideas Architect

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.

60b845e7-49f8-4065-8b4b-b5ee93d0e507.description: The Rockstar badge is awarded to an outstanding performer on the team. Earners of this badge exceed expectations and consistently demonstrate initiative, creativity, and resourcefulness in their work including cross-collaboration with other teams at Talend.
60b845e7-49f8-4065-8b4b-b5ee93d0e507.name: Talend Support Rockstar

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.

af6f79b5-129d-48c4-b67d-271fe9d61750.description: The Special Ops badge is awarded to candidates who complete strategic projects focused on resolving business problems, improving internal processes, or creating significant customer self-service opportunities.
af6f79b5-129d-48c4-b67d-271fe9d61750.name: Talend Support Special Ops

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.

0b42380e-8f20-4f90-9024-0bcd15c0c64e.description: The Team Champion badge is awarded to those who exemplify Teamwork. Earners of this badge engage with internal or external teams and help build a long-term partnership to foster collaboration, communication, and cooperation across teams.
0b42380e-8f20-4f90-9024-0bcd15c0c64e.name: Talend Support Team Champion

badge_template_activities.title: This award is given as part of the Talend Global Services and Support organizations quarterly recognition program for the Talend Support team.
